name: Rainslasher
desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Lead Elixir
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Jueyun Karst is the realm of the mighty and illuminated adepti. But other than the ability to control the elements of the world, Jueyun Karst is also home to three other untold secrets: Alchemy, Sigils, and Sub-Space Creation.

materials.name: Mist Grass Pollen
materials.desc: Strange spores created by Mist Grass in enclosed spaces. They are the Cicins' favorite food.

materials.name: Divining Scroll
materials.desc: A scroll that likely relates to some kind of magic. Exudes an inexplicable but ominous warmth.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Mercury Elixir
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
With Fulu (Sigils), the adepti can store their power in the form of symbols, and with Waijing (Sub-Space Creation) they can fashion a cosmic paradise with the power of their minds. The manufacture of elixirs, however, has always been shrouded in mystery, for certain death follows for any who swallow them.

materials.name: Mist Grass Pollen
materials.desc: Strange spores created by Mist Grass in enclosed spaces. They are the Cicins' favorite food.

materials.name: Divining Scroll
materials.desc: A scroll that likely relates to some kind of magic. Exudes an inexplicable but ominous warmth.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Mercury Elixir
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
With Fulu (Sigils), the adepti can store their power in the form of symbols, and with Waijing (Sub-Space Creation) they can fashion a cosmic paradise with the power of their minds. The manufacture of elixirs, however, has always been shrouded in mystery, for certain death follows for any who swallow them.

materials.name: Mist Grass
materials.desc: Well-preserved Mist Grass. Some would take advantage of the Cicins' love for the Mist Grass to control them.

materials.name: Sealed Scroll
materials.desc: An old scroll lacking in detail and clarity. By following the images on it, some magical creatures can recreate a small part of its magic.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Gold Elixir
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Elixirs are in fact pills made from metal alloys. They were created by the adepti, and are able to grant weapons transcendent powers. However, they are rarely seen in the world due to the hubris of the practitioners of martial arts, who prized the ways of combat over the paths of the adepti.

materials.name: Mist Grass
materials.desc: Well-preserved Mist Grass. Some would take advantage of the Cicins' love for the Mist Grass to control them.

materials.name: Sealed Scroll
materials.desc: An old scroll lacking in detail and clarity. By following the images on it, some magical creatures can recreate a small part of its magic.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Gold Elixir
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Elixirs are in fact pills made from metal alloys. They were created by the adepti, and are able to grant weapons transcendent powers. However, they are rarely seen in the world due to the hubris of the practitioners of martial arts, who prized the ways of combat over the paths of the adepti.

materials.name: Mist Grass Wick
materials.desc: A rare bundle of Mist Grass that gives off a faint glow. Those who carry it invite both the Cicins and misfortune.

materials.name: Forbidden Curse Scroll
materials.desc: A scroll inscribed with ancient images. It is said that few can decipher its meaning, and the few scholars that have all went mad.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Primo Elixir
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
An elixir of the highest quality. It embodies a state of intertwining order and chaos, and is said to mirror how the world was when it was first created. Of course, a certain someone knows that this was not the case.

materials.name: Mist Grass Wick
materials.desc: A rare bundle of Mist Grass that gives off a faint glow. Those who carry it invite both the Cicins and misfortune.

materials.name: Forbidden Curse Scroll
materials.desc: A scroll inscribed with ancient images. It is said that few can decipher its meaning, and the few scholars that have all went mad.

customize.name: Rainslasher
customize.desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

customize.text: is available from all Character Event Wishes and Weapon Event Wishes, even when it is not a featured Weapon with a boosted drop-rate.

customize.name: A Thousand Blazing Suns
customize.desc: A greatsword that dazzles like the rising sun. It has witnessed the extinguishing and rekindling of innumerable suns.

customize.name: Lumidouce Elegy
customize.desc: A magnificent polearm adorned with azure crystal. It is said to have been a certain legendary Champion Duelist's treasure — and yet, not once was it ever used.

customize.name: Rust
customize.desc: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.

customize.name: The Flute
customize.desc: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.

customize.name: Sacrificial Fragments
customize.desc: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.

customize.name: Dragon's Bane
customize.desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

customize.name: Rainslasher
customize.desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

customize.name: Crimson Moon’s Semblance
customize.desc: A keen-edged weapon, luster dazzling as the crimson moon. It is said that an ancient dynasty once regarded it as a ritual object that could bridge two worlds, but none still remember the beliefs and ceremonies of that bygone age.

customize.name: Absolution
customize.desc: A rapier once wielded by a deceiver who had forsaken everything. In the past, it was primarily used as a tool when he had to disguise his identity.

customize.name: Sacrificial Bow
customize.desc: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: Lion's Roar
customize.desc: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise on durability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.

customize.name: The Widsith
customize.desc: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.

customize.name: Lithic Spear
customize.desc: A spear forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest. Its hardness knows no equal.

customize.name: Rainslasher
customize.desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

customize.name: Fang of the Mountain King
customize.desc: A giant sword forged from pure turquoise. Due to its greater weight than most ordinary weapons, it was named for Kongomato the Mountain King.

customize.name: Engulfing Lightning
customize.desc: A naginata used to "cut grass." Any army that stands before this weapon will probably be likewise cut down...

customize.name: Sacrificial Bow
customize.desc: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: The Widsith

customize.name: Favonius Lance
customize.desc: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

customize.name: Rainslasher
customize.desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

customize.name: Tulaytullah's Remembrance
customize.desc: A bell crafted of deep sapphire and sterling silver. Its echoes are as crisp as they are distant.

customize.name: Jadefall's Splendor
customize.desc: A ritual vessel carved from jade that reflects the luster of the skies and the clear waters.

customize.name: Range Gauge
customize.desc: A measuring instrument that you can rarely find nowadays. It is capable of firing arrows.

customize.name: Favonius Sword
customize.desc: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!

customize.name: Skyward Harp
customize.desc: A greatbow that symbolizes Dvalin's affiliation with the Anemo Archon. The sound of the bow firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears. It contains the power of the sky and wind within.

customize.name: Amos' Bow
customize.desc: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its original master being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in the world, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires, the more powerful it is.

customize.name: Skyward Blade
customize.desc: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.

customize.desc: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil — just like the last heroine who wielded it.

customize.name: Skyward Pride
customize.desc: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.

customize.name: Wolf's Gravestone
customize.desc: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.

customize.name: Skyward Spine
customize.desc: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.

customize.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
customize.desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.

customize.name: Skyward Atlas
customize.desc: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and his former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.

desc.text:
A dimly fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge.
Years ago it was known as the "Beacon of the Nether" by the mountain bandits.
Seeing it meant there was no way back.
The only way was forward, towards the end of one's life.
"Formless, like the rain that cuts through rain. Weightless, like the light that pierces light."
"Untouchable, moving like a snake. Inescapable, as sword's stare and polearm's glance."
The Rainslasher was named out of reverence for its master. Originally it had no name.
The blade's first and final master was a martial nomad who went by the name of Guhua.
It is said that he was an adeptus. While Guhua lived, bandits dared not act and the wilderness knew a peace like that of the city.
Allegedly, at the end of his journey he ascended in a purple haze and became a star.
One to whom Guhua had shown kindness founded what is now known as the Guhua School in his honor. But no school is destined to last forever.

value.text: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <color=#37ffff>20%/24%/28%/32%/36%</color> .
